content.description:
Percent Who Believe the Issue Should be a Top Priority in 2019 by Political Party Affiliation.

Source: Pew Research Center, 2019
content.question:
Respond to parts A, B, C, and D.

Identify the issue that the greatest percentage of Democrats believe should be a top priority in 2019.

Describe a difference between Democrats and Republicans on which issues they believe should be a top priority.

Draw a conclusion about why the parties differ on the issues shown on the chart.

Explain how the information in the chart could be used by candidates running for office.

frqParts.text:
